mapper.select:
select dm.serialNum,dm.stockCount,s.serialNum as s_serialNum, s.deliverSerial, s.takeDeliverSerial, s.inOutNum, s.stockDate, s.operator, s.contactNum, s.status, s.remark, s.delFlg, s.creator, s.createTime, s.updater, s.updateTime, d.supplyComId,d.deliverNum,dm.orderMaterielSerial from stockInOutRecord s left join delivery d on d.serialNum = s.deliverSerial left join deliveryMateriel dm on dm.deliverSerial = s.deliverSerial
order by ${orderByClause}
select count(s.serialNum) from stockInOutRecord s left join delivery d on d.serialNum = s.deliverSerial left join deliveryMateriel dm on dm.deliverSerial = s.deliverSerial
